sqls.sql: UPDATE me_dt_import_tmp SET dt_id = @dt_id, dt_no = @dt_no, dt_name = @dt_name, dt_ip = @dt_ip, dt_mac = @dt_mac, wkc_no = @wkc_no, dt_rmk10 = @dt_rmk10, dt_rmk11 = @dt_rmk11, dt_rmk12 = @dt_rmk12, dt_rmk13 = @dt_rmk13, dt_sys_user = @dt_sys_user, dt_sys_pass = @dt_sys_pass, dt_db_type = @dt_db_type, dt_port = @dt_port, dt_db_user = @dt_db_user, dt_db_pass = @dt_db_pass, dt_db_name = @dt_db_name, crt_time = @crt_time, crt_user = @crt_user, crt_user_no = @crt_user_no, crt_user_name = @crt_user_name, crt_host = @crt_host, upd_time = @upd_time, upd_user = @upd_user, upd_user_no = @upd_user_no, upd_user_name = @upd_user_name, upd_host = @upd_host, ea_no = @ea_no, wka_no = @wka_no;
